This data set is from https://vincentarelbundock.github.io/Rdatasets/articles/data.html. It is number 61.

Part 2: Import the data set
```{r}
DF <- read.csv("~/Downloads/NaturalGas.csv")
```
 Part 3: Descriptive Statistics
```{r}
summary(DF)
```

```{r}
mean(DF$price)
median(DF$price)
range(DF$price)
```

```{r}
median(DF$year)
```
```{r}
mean (DF$eprice)
median(DF$eprice)
range((DF$eprice))
```
```{r}
mean (DF$lprice)
median(DF$lprice)
range(DF$lprice)
```
```{r}
mean (DF$oprice)
median(DF$oprice)
range(DF$oprice)
```
```{r}
print(IQR(DF$price))
print(IQR(DF$epice))
print(IQR(DF$lprice))
print(IQR(DF$oprice))
      
```
```{r}
list(DF$state)
```
Part 4: Transform that data
```{r}
summary(DF$consumption)
summary(log10(DF$consumption))
```
Part 5: plots
```{r}
plot(DF$price)
plot(DF$income)
hist(DF$price)
hist(DF$income)
```
